      • getContas

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getContas()
        Get a List of all OrganizadorConta Organizer Bank Accounts of the logged-in Organizer for a Dropdown Box. The list includes a String Message "Select" in the language of the corresponding Locale.
        Returns:
        the List of all currently selected OrganizadorConta Permission Groups.
